title: Wallet
description: Mobile ID wallet that allows users to store identity credentials from any issuer worldwide and seamlessly authenticate to digital services by scanning QR codes

bullets.title: HASSLE-FREE AUTHENTICATION
bullets.description: Passwordless, instant and privacy-preserving authentication that offers control over shared personal information all in one place

bullets.title: TRUSTED IDENTITY
bullets.description: ID Credentials are created according to a global Internet standard and certified by Trusted Authorities so that they can be trusted everywhere

bullets.title: ENHANCED SECURITY
bullets.description: Data and ID credentials are protected with biometrics and post-quantum cryptography for maximum protection
